locationInformation: Conveniently located to enjoy the bars and restaurants of St Lawrence Gap
name: Southern Palms
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: The Southern Palms is a candy-pink, colonial-style hotel. It’s tucked among palms and lawns on the outskirts of St Lawrence Gap, just a few minutes’ walk from the nearest wine bars and restaurants.

locationInformation: Walking distance to St Lawrence Gap
In the heart of local restaurants and bars
name: Dover Beach Hotel
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: Beachfront boltholes don’t get much better than this. The hotel’s pulled up to the sand in the south of Barbados, just 10 minutes’ stroll from entertainment hub St Lawrence Gap. The beach is as picture-perfect as they come – think white sand and the island’s trademark blue water.

locationInformation: Next to well known Dover playing field
name: Time Out Hotel
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: You’ll find Dover Beach around a minute’s walk from this place, backed by a row of shade-giving palm trees. Or, if planting yourself by the pool is on your agenda, you can pull up a sunlounger on the spacious terrace.

locationInformation: In the lively resort of St Lawrence Gap
name: Rostrevor Apartment Hotel
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: The family-run Rostrevor Aparthotel is set in the heart of the lively St Lawrence Gap district, so you’ve got restaurants, nightclubs and reggae lounges on your doorstep.

locationInformation: Located in Dover and near St. Lawrence Gap
A host of bars and restaurants nearby
name: Turtle Beach Resort
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: This place is pulled right up beside a thick ribbon of sugar-white sand. A 10-minute stroll along the shorefront will bring you to the candy-coloured rum shacks and cafés of the famous St Lawrence Gap.

name: Divi Southwinds Beach Resort
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: This colourful oceanfront retreat is a hop, skip and a jump from a white-sand beach. Plus, if you take a five-minute stroll, you’ll reach The Gap, where streets are lined with rum shacks, Bajan restaurants and reggae dancehalls.

name: O2 Beach Club & Spa
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: O2 Beach Club & Spa is set on a beach that’s freckled with coconut palms and washed by the turquoise waters of the Caribbean Sea. Wade out into the shallows and you’ll find a coral reef teeming with sea life.

name: A la Carte
strapline: Luxury hotels from around the world

locationInformation: In the heart of Christ Church's entertainment district
Close to restaurants and bars playing music
name: Infinity on the Beach
strapline: With holidays to St Lawrence, you'll get access to unspoilt tropical beaches and a thumping nightlife scene that's unmatched anywhere else on Barbados.
introduction: This hotel cosies up to an 800-metre-long sweep of chalk-white beach, which lines up gently shelving sand, calm shallows and watersports*. For daytrips, Bridgetown’s a 15-minute drive away, and for nights out, you've got a crop of lively bars next-door.
